website_summaries.verdict: An amazingly low price for such a quality play set. Filled with terrific pieces that are detailed and fun.
pros: Banish the portal beast from Dr. Strange’s sanctum
Amazing beast has rotating teeth, moving eyes, and snaring tentacles
Set measures a full foot wide
cons: Not as action-filled as other super hero sets

customer_reviews.title: At first glance I wasn't sure if this set was for me...
customer_reviews.text: but after seeing the Dr. Strange movie I knew that I had to have it! I love the mini figs. They're really detailed and similar to the characters in the movie! (Benedict Cumberbatch lego mini fig!?!) All of the details of the set are fabulous and pretty accurate to the movie. (i.e. references to the library, mystical objects, letting the mini figures fly and fight, and a monster coming out, the window) Not sure if I'm just going to display this as is, build a house/building for it, or add it on to another building. But I love it and really glad I got it after seeing the movie!
customer_reviews.author: Brett TTop Contributor: Architecture

customer_reviews.title: Neat Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a 6-year-old. He loves it and could put it together easily. The tentacle monster coming out of the wall has a gear mechanism on the back, so that when you turn a wheel, the tentacles wiggle around. I thought that was pretty neat. I'd highly recommend this for any Lego Avengers fanatics.
customer_reviews.author: NSCPE

customer_reviews.title: Dr strange is the Best!!!
customer_reviews.text: this set is awesome and a good price can't complain and came in a timely manner excellent condition great addition to my lego collection... %100 satisfied happy customer 😉 buy it before its gone forever..
customer_reviews.author: B.T.N

customer_reviews.title: Twins love this
customer_reviews.text: purchased other games related to this, now their big brother can film this action with children for their future viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Big Success...
customer_reviews.text: So successful Christmas morning, that it was put together completely two hours later. He loved it. I'm always happy when something is enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: SkylarRose

customer_reviews.title: Yay Legos!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set, was a good price, and came in timely manner in great condition. Thanks for the addition to my collection!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Product matches
customer_reviews.text: Package was in great condition. No missing pieces or damage. This set has more mechanics than most and was a fun build for my man and my son.
customer_reviews.author: MommySharkx2

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves Dr. Strange and I was very excited to find this Lego set to give him for Christmas. I just received it in the mail last night and the box is very dented and damaged and also scotch taped on the sides. Looks to be a used product. Will be returning item.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best set for getting Dr Strange
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the only set I seen LEGO make so far that includes all the protagonists from a movie.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Lee

customer_reviews.title: but it arrived quickly and the price was great. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: We haven't put this together yet, but it arrived quickly and the price was great. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cyber Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fun to put together. Great addition to my Marvel collection.
customer_reviews.author: Jennilee C. Baewer

customer_reviews.title: Great to do business with
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves legos . This added to his collection made his day
customer_reviews.author: R. Shattuck

customer_reviews.title: Dr. Strange LEGO set  is super Cool
customer_reviews.text: Fun set to build. Dr. Strange's cape matches the movie's cape. It is great to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria - L. A.

customer_reviews.title: He enjoyed it very much
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift for my grandson. He enjoyed it very much! Too many pieces for me but not for him!
customer_reviews.author: Evangelina Valles

customer_reviews.title: Customer Delight
customer_reviews.text: Easy assemble and delight of my grandson due to that is priceless for me
customer_reviews.author: Anil Dhond

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set!
customer_reviews.text: Great set with lots of moving parts. It was a joy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Nightstalker320

customer_reviews.title: This was a Christmas present for my godchild's 8 year ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my godchild's 8 year old and he absolutely loves it. Plays with it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine M. Chiffriller

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boys love legos and immediately put this together. It fits in very well with legoland.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: worth the money i spent on it
customer_reviews.text: Great set, got it yesterday, the figures are amazing, the play features are okay, but all in all, its a very good set, worth the money I spent on it
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Gries

customer_reviews.title: Damage and used toy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this toy november 27 2020, for my kids christmas present and it arrive open, with tapes on it, the box was dirty and damage, this toy is used, Im not satisfy with my purchase, my kids christmas present is now ruined because this situation.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

product_meta.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes - 76060 Doctor Strange's Sanctum Sanctorum
product_meta.description: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes - 76060 Doctor Strange's Sanctum Sanctorum
feature_bullets: Banish the portal beast from Doctor Strange's Sanctum Sanctorum
Includes 3 minifigures: Doctor Strange, Karl Mordo and The Ancient One

Doctor Strange's Sanctum Sanctorum features a portal beast with rotating teeth, moving eyes and tentacles that can trap minifigures, shelves for mystical artifact accessories, levitation effect for 2 minifigures, and levitation function for Doctor Stran
anctum Sanctorum measures over 4” (11cm) high, 12” (31cm) wide and 7” (18cm) deep

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars158 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
